cell-methods: Error: depth: longitude: sum where sea (along a zig-zag grid path spanning a basin) where sea time: mean not found in cell methods, please register
description: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized mesoscale eddy-induced advective transport. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.
ui-label: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection
